text: Barry Jackson (29 March 1938 - 5 December 2013) was an English movie and television actor. His movie roles include Ryan's Daughter, Barry Lyndon, Aces High, The Raging Moon, Mr. Love, Toscanini in His Own Words, and Wimbledon. He died in London on 5 December 2013 from a stroke, aged 75.Barry Jackson dead: Midsomer Murders star played pathologist Dr George Bullard for decade ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:English voice actors Category:Actors from Birmingham
title: Barry Jackson
